title: "What is the hidden influence on our actions and thoughts according to the logic of the subconscious?"
first_phrase: This text explores the idea that consciousness has a hidden underlying layer, and that certain subconscious thoughts can determine our actions. The author argues that there are forces and beings that operate behind the scenes of our consciousness, using our own thoughts and intentions to manipulate us for their own purposes. The text suggests that many of our actions and decisions are not truly our own, but rather the result of hidden influences that we may not even be aware of. In the last 200 tokens, the text delves deeper into these hidden influences, and suggests that much of what we perceive as chance or spontaneity in life may actually be the result of these underlying forces at work.
content: Come una larn pada cieca fa luce dinanzi, non dietro a sé — cosi la vostra conscienza: non siete, né sapete, voi, chi la conduce ad illuminare proprio quello che essa illumina: affinché ciò sia visto e ciò no, certe risoluzioni avvengano, certe altre no. Orbene: l'azione occulta sugli uomini si esercita ap punto in questa penombra, per queste vie che corrono phí profondamente che non la conscienza vostra, Esseri, che restano fra le quinte, per agire, usano i vostri stessi pensieri, e cosi vi lasciano la credenza di essere perfet tamente liberi. Si determina l'idea di quello che si vuo le, la si rifinisce, la si alimenta, poi ve la si depone dentro in attesa che il germe si sviluppi e produca spon taneamente quelle « ragioni », quelle giustificazioni idea li, morali o sentimentali, perfino sperimentali, che sono più opportune per condurvi alla cosa prestabilita. Pensate: quanto « caso » c'è, nella vita di voi uomi ni! quanta « spontaneità »!
last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to be aware of the hidden forces that operate in the depths of our consciousness, as they can influence our thoughts and actions without our knowledge or consent. By understanding the power of these forces and taking steps to guard against them, we can become more intentional in our decision-making and lead more fulfilling lives. Remember, the vacant spaces of chance can be filled with causes, and it is up to us to choose which ones guide our journey.
